component.name: Samba Configurator
component.summary: Manage Samba shared folders with ease

description.p: Samba Configurator is a user-friendly graphical application for managing Samba shared folders on Linux systems. It provides an intuitive GTK4 interface to add, edit, and remove network shares with support for multiple languages.

ul.li: Add and remove Samba shares with a simple interface
Edit share properties including permissions, users, and masks
Support for guest access and read-only shares
Advanced options for expert users (directory mask, create mask)
Multi-language support (Italian, English, German, Spanish, French)
Start and stop Samba service directly from the app

screenshot.caption: Main window showing shared folders list

ul.li: Added custom application icon with multi-resolution support
Icon available in 8 different resolutions (16x16 to 512x512)
Added translations for Italian, English, German, Spanish, French
Automatic language detection based on system locale
Complete translation of all UI strings
Fixed pkexec syntax error preventing program launch
GTK4-based graphical interface for Samba share management
Add, edit, and remove shared folders functionality
Permission management (read-only, guest access, valid users)
